name: Layla
description: Layla is a long-range marksman hero who excels at dealing massive damage from a distance. Her ultimate ability, Destruction Rush, can eliminate low-health enemies with ease.

name: Gatotkaca
description: Gatotkaca is a durable tank hero known for his crowd control abilities and protective skills. His ultimate, Unbreakable, allows him to leap into battle and protect allies.

name: Gusion
description: Gusion is a highly mobile assassin with complex combo mechanics. His ability to dash multiple times makes him deadly for eliminating squishy targets.

name: Angela
description: Angela is a support hero who can attach to allies to provide healing and shields. Her ultimate, Heartguard, allows her to teleport to any ally on the map.

name: Chou
description: Chou is a versatile fighter with exceptional crowd control capabilities. His Shunpo ability allows him to dash through enemies and deliver powerful kicks.

name: Lunox
description: Lunox is a powerful mage who can switch between light and dark forms. Her ultimate, Chaos Assault, unleashes devastating area damage to multiple enemies.

name: Fanny
description: Fanny is a highly mobile assassin who uses cables to traverse the battlefield. Her Tornado Strike ability allows her to deal massive damage to enemies in her path.

name: Johnson
description: Johnson is a transforming tank hero who can turn into a car to transport allies. His ultimate, Rapid Touchdown, allows him to charge across the map at high speed.

name: Kagura
description: Kagura is a mage who manipulates her umbrella to control the battlefield. Her Yin Yang Overturn ability creates a powerful area of effect that damages and stuns enemies.

name: Aldous
description: Aldous is a fighter who gains power as he collects souls. His ultimate, Contract: Chase Fate, allows him to lock onto any enemy hero anywhere on the map.

name: Hayabusa
description: Hayabusa is a ninja assassin who excels at split pushing and 1v1 duels. His ultimate, Quad Shadow, allows him to dash between multiple enemies, dealing massive damage.

name: Ling
description: Ling is a agile assassin who can walk on walls. His ultimate, Tempest of Blades, creates a sword formation that damages and slows enemies within its area.

name: Zilong
description: Zilong is a fast-moving fighter who excels at chasing down enemies. His ultimate, Supreme Warrior, increases his movement and attack speed while removing all slows.

name: Hanzo
description: Hanzo is a unique assassin who can possess enemies from a distance. His ultimate, Kinjutsu: Pinnacle Ninja, allows him to control a demonic form while his real body remains hidden.

name: Yu Zhong
description: Yu Zhong is a powerful dragon warrior who can transform into a Black Dragon. His ultimate, Furious Dive, allows him to soar through the air and crash down on enemies.
